summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GameShop Nepal e-commerce application. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend homepage, admin login, and daily rewards page all loading and functioning properly.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200 OK)
Admin login API with gsnadmin/gsnadmin credentials
Categories API endpoint (returns empty array as expected)
Products API endpoint (returns empty array as expected)
Reviews API endpoint (returns 3 reviews)
Social Links API endpoint (returns 4 social links)
Pages API endpoints (about, contact, faq)
Product CRUD operations (create, update, delete)
Review CRUD operations (create, update, delete)
Frontend homepage loads correctly with GSN branding
Navigation menu functional (Home, Daily Rewards, About)
Customer reviews section displays properly
Products section shows 'No products found' (expected for empty DB)
Trust & Safety section displays security features
Daily Rewards page loads with proper content
Daily Rewards shows login prompt for unauthenticated users
Daily Rewards 'How it works' section displays correctly
Admin login form renders properly
Admin authentication successful with gsnadmin/gsnadmin
Admin dashboard accessible after login
Admin sidebar navigation complete with all menu items
Admin dashboard statistics display correctly

homepage_loading.details: Homepage loads correctly with GSN branding, navigation, customer reviews, products section, and trust & safety features

backend_api_categories.details: /api/categories endpoint returns 200 OK with empty array (expected for fresh setup)

backend_api_products.details: /api/products endpoint returns 200 OK with empty array (expected for fresh setup)

admin_login.details: Admin login with gsnadmin/gsnadmin works correctly, returns JWT token and user data

admin_dashboard.details: Admin dashboard accessible after login with complete sidebar navigation and dashboard statistics

daily_rewards_page.details: Daily Rewards page loads at /daily-reward with proper content, login prompt, and how-it-works section

database_status: Empty database as expected for fresh GitHub clone - 0 categories, 0 products, 3 seeded reviews, 4 social links
smtp_imgbb_status: Credentials configured in backend/.env - SMTP (gameshopnepal.buy@gmail.com) and ImgBB API key present
environment_notes: Application running on https://ganguli-wata.preview.emergentagent.com with proper SSL and responsive design
